code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";export const useFetch=function(apiPath){let queryTerm=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"";const[movies,setMovies]=useState([]);const url=`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/${apiPath}?api_key=${process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY}&query=${queryTerm}`;useEffect(()=>{async function getMovies(){const response=await fetch(url);const data=await response.json();await setMovies(data.results);}getMovies();},[url]);return movies;};
